waddington.kai.main.knnf.layers.neurons

Class NeuronInput

  • java.lang.Object
    • waddington.kai.main.knnf.layers.neurons.Neuron
      • waddington.kai.main.knnf.layers.neurons.NeuronInput

  • public class NeuronInput
extends Neuron
    This is the class for input-layer neurons. It extends the Neuron class.
